revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Old Chateau |image = [[File:Old Chateau.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Old Chateau. |tokens = 48,000 |location = West of Route 205. }} The '''Old Chateau''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 553,000 |- | Rotom (Boss) || 2,200,000 |- | Rotom forms (Boss) || 2,300,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Gastly * Haunter * Gengar * Rotom (boss)
Catching Rotom unlocks its forms: * Rotom (heat) (boss) * Rotom (wash) (boss) * Rotom (frost) (boss) * Rotom (fan) (boss) * Rotom (mow) (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
